name: serverless
description: A Rust serverless function template for cloud deployment with support for AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, Azure Functions, Vercel, and Netlify

options.name: cloud_provider
options.description: Which cloud provider would you like to target for your serverless function?

help.aws: AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that runs your code in response to events and automatically manages the underlying compute resources.
help.gcp: Google Cloud Functions is a serverless execution environment for building and connecting cloud services.
help.azure: Azure Functions is a serverless solution that allows you to write less code, maintain less infrastructure, and save on costs.
help.vercel: Vercel Functions provide a serverless platform for deploying functions that run on-demand and scale automatically.
help.netlify: Netlify Functions let you deploy server-side code that runs in response to events, without having to run a dedicated server.

next_steps_azure: # Deploy: func azure functionapp publish your-function-app
next_steps_vercel: # Install Vercel CLI: npm i -g vercel
next_steps_netlify: # Install Netlify CLI: npm i -g netlify-cli
